p: A methanolic solution of 40 μg·mL −1 DPPH was prepared. The essential oil was diluted in methanol at concentrations of 5; 2.5; 1.0; 0.75; 0.50 e 0.25 mg·mL −1. For the evaluation, 2.7 mL of DPPH stock solution was added in a test tube, followed by the addition of 0.3 mL of the essential oil solution. The preparation of the negative control was performed from a mixture of 2.7 mL of methanol and the methanolic solution of T. diversifolia essential oil. After 30 minutes, spectrophotometric readings (Biospectro SP-22) were performed at 517 nm wavelength [ 53].
